Registrations Now Open for Robotix 2013

For all the events of Robotix 2013, visit: www.robotix.in

For registrations:

  • Visit Kshitij website: http://www.ktj.in/

  • Register on the website by clicking ‘register’ in the top right corner of the home page.

  • Fill in all the details.

  • The following window will appear.

  • Click on ‘sign in’ in the top right corner.

  • Fill in your ‘Username’ and ‘Password’.
  • Click on ‘MyKtj’ in the top right corner of the page. Your profile page will appear in front of you.
  • Click on ‘Teams’ tab on the page.

  • In the ‘Select event to register for’ dropdown menu, select the events you want to register for one-by-one.

  • The following window will appear for every successful registration.
  • You can then add teammates for each event you have registered for.

For any further details visit: www.robotix.in
